Journal.Title: Huan jing ke xue= Huanjing kexue

Article.ArticleTitle: [Ozone and carbon monoxide concentration distribution on Taishan Mountain].

AbstractText: The concentrations of ozone (O3) and carbon monoxide (CO) on the top of Taishan Mountain were monitored, and the variations and correlation were studied. The results show that the frequency of O3 hourly concentrations more than the first-degree of National Ambient Air Quality Standard(GB-3095-1996, NAAQS) was 15.81%, and the frequency of CO concentrations more than the first-degree of NAAQS was zero. The variation of O3 concentrations appears in a narrow scope, which indicates that there is scarcely influenced by the pollution of industry around. The diurnal variation of the concentrations of O3 and that of CO both present two peaks with the peaks of O3 in the behind of CO, which indicates that the concentration variations of O3 and its precursor CO are primarily controlled by local photochemical reaction process. The daily concentrations of O3 correlated well with CO.
